channel.title: Introduction to Data Science (W35-36) on Social / Business Data Science 2023
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction to Data Science (W35-36) on Social / Business Data Science 2023

item.title: Welcome Students!
item.description: This session will introduce you to the fundamentals of data science, with a focus on Python. We will cover the Python data science stack, essential tools and platforms, software setup, semester overview, and Python 101. Session 1: Welcome Students! This session sets the stage for your data science journey: Python Data Science Stack: Dive into Python’s core data science libraries and frameworks. We’ve got you covered! Ecosystem Deep Dive: Familiarize yourself with essential tools and platforms, such as Github, UCloud, Google Colab, and Jupyter.

item.title: Introduction to Data Science (W 35)
item.description: This session will introduce students to the fundamentals of data science, with a focus on Python. Topics covered will include Python data science libraries and frameworks, essential tools and platforms, data handling and manipulation, exploratory data analysis and essential statistics, data visualization, and more. Students will have the opportunity to practice the skills they learn through hands-on exercises and projects. Part 2: Data Handling and Manipulation I (Lecture) In this session, we’ll explore the foundational aspects of data handling.
